lines.flavourText:
The night of a thousand ribbons
To remember the day of a thousand flames
When Sarn burned
And was born again

lines.name: Light of Lunaris

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (35-39) to (54-60) Cold Damage to Spells
(60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
+1% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 1% Chance to Block Attack Damage
+25% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've dealt a Non-Critical Strike Recently

lines.flavourText: Without night, there can be no day.

lines.name: Zahndethus' Cassock

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% chance to create Consecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
When dead men rise and darkness falls
Only faith can be your walls
Walls of Light, not of brick
Twice as strong and twice as thick

lines.name: Skin of the Loyal
Inpulsa's Broken Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (20-50)% increased Damage if you have Shocked an Enemy Recently

Shocked Enemies you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of
their Life as Lightning Damage which cannot Shock

lines.flavourText:
Don't hesitate; bring death to all, conclusively and swiftly,
or they will give you the same treatment.

lines.name: Farrul's Bite

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Cat Skill
+1% to Critical Strike Chance while affected by Aspect of the Cat
Critical Strikes have (10-20)% chance to Blind Enemies while you have Cat's Stealth
(40-50)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
It is a fool who strikes the turtle's shell.
The First of the Plains teaches us to exploit weaknesses,
and where no weakness can be found, to create one.

lines.name: Crystal Vault

explicitModifiers.text: 20% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage
30% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
Beneath the frozen eye of Lunaris
a new world will be born.
A crystalline, perfectly still utopia.

lines.name: The Stampede

explicitModifiers.text: Travel Skills have (50-80)% increased Cooldown Recovery Speed
(30-40)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate while moving
Your Movement Speed is 150% of its base value

lines.flavourText:
Relentlessness. Nothing more, nothing less.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

lines.name: Skyforth

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
Stun Threshold is based on 500% of your Mana instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
The quick die young, the brilliant go mad,
and the powerful stand alone in a wasteland of their own creation.

lines.name: Hyrri's Ire

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (105-145) to (160-200) Cold Damage to Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Hyrri loosed a barrage of arrows,
tipped with a poisoned hatred
only oppression can ferment.

lines.name: Doryani's Delusion

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 25 Purity of Fire Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Ice Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Lightning Skill
Adds (1-3) to (68-72) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Every day we choose safety or knowledge. 
Live and stagnate, or risk death for truth.
I would rather see the end of the Vaal
than help it tread water." 
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: The Iron Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: +1% Chance to Block Attack Damage per 50 Strength
Chance to Block Spell Damage is Unlucky

Strength's Damage Bonus instead grants 3% increased Melee
Physical Damage per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"Stand steadfast in the face of destruction.
The Council cannot afford to falter."
- Mauritius, the Iron Heart

lines.name: Carcass Jack
lines.flavourText:
"...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none
can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."
- Maligaro's Journal

lines.name: The Perfect Form

explicitModifiers.text: Arctic Armour has 100% reduced Mana Reservation
Evasion Rating is increased by Uncapped Cold Resistance

lines.flavourText:
We share one space,
speak one voice,
act through one body.
A flawless crystal.
Brittle.

lines.name: Shavronne's Wrappings

explicitModifiers.text: 10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
Chaos Damage does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.name: Victario's Influence

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Generosity
Socketed Gems have 30% reduced Mana Reservation
(20-40)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
(10-15)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Every life is a story.
If you're not writing your own,
you'd better know who's writing it for you!"
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Wildwrap
lines.flavourText:
"Laws are for city folk.
Can't try a man for murder if you can't find him."
- Taruk, Last of the Wildmen

lines.name: Craiceann's Chitin

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot lose Crab Barriers if you have lost Crab Barriers Recently
+(3-5)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while you have at least (5-10) Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
When the rains come, we cower beneath shelter.
The First of the Deep teaches us
that we should seek no shelter but ourselves.

lines.name: Loreweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-10) to (14-36) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
When it comes to finding a use for surplus,
a rich man has within himself
boundless creativity.

lines.name: Hands of the High Templar

explicitModifiers.text: Can have up to 5 Implicit Modifiers while Item has this Modifier

lines.flavourText: The laws of the faith do not apply to its leader.

lines.name: Farrul's Pounce

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks always inflict Bleeding while you have Cat's Stealth
(40-50)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Bleeding Enemies
You have Crimson Dance while you have Cat's Stealth

lines.flavourText:
A hungry beast wastes no energy. 
Every strike, no matter how small, must work towards victory.
The First of the Plains teaches us 
that the largest prey can still be whittled away.

lines.name: Slavedriver's Hand

explicitModifiers.text: Skills used by Traps have (10-20)% increased Area of Effect
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also Apply to Trap Throwing Speed

10% chance to gain an Endurance, Frenzy or Power Charge when any
of your Traps are Triggered by an Enemy
Skills which throw Traps have Blood Magic

lines.flavourText: A plan without a deadline stays a plan.

lines.name: Magna Eclipsis

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Elemental Aegis when Equipped
+(80-100) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Lunaris crossed silently, shining and full, 
Softly night left her, alone and forlorn.
Solaris rose to meet her, feeling her pull.
'Neath the midday sun, the night was reborn.

lines.name: Soul Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Spell Totem
+1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems
Inflicts a random Level 20 Curse on you when your Totems die

lines.flavourText:
The greatest mistakes cause suffering 
long after they have been made

lines.name: Voll's Protector

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

lines.name: Geofri's Legacy

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Holy Relics
Summoned Holy Relics have (20-25)% reduced Cooldown Recovery Speed

lines.flavourText:
"Though Geofri's beacon was extinguished,
his embers may yet light our way."
- Victario, The People's Poet

lines.name: Queen of the Forest

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per 600 Evasion Rating, up to 75%
-(50-40) Physical Damage taken from Hits by Animals

lines.flavourText:
Shedding away her regal past, 
she forged a new destiny. 
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man, 
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature. 
Seizing her one true wish, 
she found peace at last.

lines.name: Farrul's Chase

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Intimidating Cry when you lose Cat's Stealth
20% increased Movement Speed while you have Cat's Stealth

lines.flavourText:
A secret is a weapon your enemies do not have.
When the First of the Plains hunted, she moved in silence and acted quickly.
To do otherwise is to arm your foes.

lines.name: Daresso's Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: (0.41-0.6)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You lose all Endurance Charges when Hit
You gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
You gain Onslaught for 5 seconds per Endurance Charge when Hit

lines.flavourText:
"When your back is against the wall,
And your opponent is bleeding you dry,
There is only one appropriate response:
Unbridled, overwhelming violence."
- Daresso, the Sword King

lines.name: Craiceann's Pincers

explicitModifiers.text:
10% chance that if you would gain a Crab Barrier, you instead gain up to
your maximum number of Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
The stone that stays in the waves soon crumbles to sand.
The First of the Deep teaches us to watch the tides
and choose our moments to move wisely.

lines.name: Craiceann's Tracks

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be Stunned if you have at least 10 Crab Barriers
You only lose (5-7) Crab Barriers when you take Physical Damage from a Hit

lines.flavourText:
When the land rose above the sea, The First of the Deep did not move.
When the sky turned to fire, The First of the Deep did not perish.
We must remember our place, and play to our strengths.

lines.name: Aukuna's Will

explicitModifiers.text: Raised Zombies have (80-100)% increased maximum Life
Raise Zombie does not require a corpse
Your Raised Zombies count as corpses

lines.flavourText: The Black Sekhema's trial had only just begun.

lines.name: Belly of the Beast
lines.flavourText:
There is no safer place
Than the Belly of the Beast

lines.name: Yriel's Fostering

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Summon Bestial Snake Skill
Projectile Attack Skills have (42-60)% increased Critical Strike Chance

Projectiles from Attacks have 20% chance to Poison on Hit while
you have a Bestial Minion
Adds (13-19)-(23-29) Chaos Damage to Attacks while you have a Bestial Minion

lines.flavourText:
Feed a beast and it will not hunt.
Protect it and it will not fight.
Ferocity must be learned, not taught.
It is suffering that forges the greatest warriors.

lines.name: Frostferno

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
+2 to Level of Socketed Cold Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Cold to Fire

lines.flavourText:
Embrace your burning ambition.
Embrace your frozen heart.
You will be transformed.

lines.name: Geofri's Sanctuary
lines.flavourText:
Faith does not make us invulnerable.
It makes us immortal.

lines.name: Rotting Legion

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Meat Shield
1% less Elemental Damage taken per Raised Zombie

lines.flavourText: A glacier of putrid meat, crushing mountains and valleys alike.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour
lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Deidbellow

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks
Cannot Leech when on Low Life
If you've Warcried Recently, you and nearby allies have 20% increased Attack, Cast and Movement Speed

lines.flavourText: May it echo through the halls.

lines.name: Hyrri's Ire

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (105-145) to (160-200) Cold Damage to Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Hyrri loosed a barrage of arrows,
tipped with a poisoned hatred
only oppression can ferment.

lines.name: Incandescent Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (0.8-1)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

lines.name: The Oak

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 3% of Life per second while on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Even the mightiest tree was once just a sapling.

lines.name: Abberath's Hooves

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 7 Abberath's Fury when Equipped
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy

lines.flavourText:
The Goat King knew not of war,
of the lands and laws he trampled.
The Goat King knew only joy
at turning life to ash.

lines.name: Tukohama's Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems

lines.flavourText:
Tukohama couldn't lose a fight in his fortress,
So he carried his fortress to the fight.

lines.name: Indigon

explicitModifiers.text: Recover (8-10)% of Life when you use a Mana Flask
Non-instant Mana Recovery from Flasks is also Recovered as Life
(50-60)% increased Mana Cost of Skills for each 200 total Mana you have Spent Recently
(20-25)% increased Spell Damage for each 200 total Mana you have Spent Recently, up to 2000%

lines.flavourText:
Where the body's limits begin,
the mind's limits end.

lines.name: Saqawal's Talons

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Avian Skill
Regenerate 100 Life per Second while you have Avian's Flight
Regenerate 12 Mana per Second while you have Avian's Flight

lines.flavourText:
A bird, too heavily laden, cannot take flight.
The First of the Sky teaches us to put aside our possessions
so that we may live more freely.

lines.name: Saqawal's Winds

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (20-25) to (37-40) Cold Damage while you have Avian's Might
Adds (1-3) to (55-62) Lightning Damage while you have Avian's Might

lines.flavourText:
When the inferno spread across the land,
it was the First of the Sky who singed his feathers
as he brought the flames to a standstill.

lines.name: Unyielding Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Commandment of Inferno on Critical Strike
(8-12)% increased Attack Speed if you've dealt a Critical Strike Recently
(8-12)% increased Cast Speed if you've dealt a Critical Strike Recently

lines.flavourText:
An Emperor must conquer his own darkness
before he can act as a beacon of light.

lines.name: Doryani's Delusion

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 25 Purity of Fire Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Ice Skill
Grants Level 25 Purity of Lightning Skill
Adds (1-3) to (68-72) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Every day we choose safety or knowledge. 
Live and stagnate, or risk death for truth.
I would rather see the end of the Vaal
than help it tread water." 
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: The Queen's Hunger

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Level 20 Bone Offering, Flesh Offering or Spirit Offering every 5 seconds
Offering Skills Triggered this way also affect you

lines.flavourText:
In their crimson nightmare, the Vaal are still sacrificing themselves to her glory and beauty. 
They stab their own hearts and cry out in ecstasy, only to rise again.

lines.name: Perfidy

explicitModifiers.text: You can have two different Banners at the same time
Banners you are carrying gain 1 Stage on Melee Hit, up to 5 per second
War Banner has (100-200)% increased Adrenaline duration
Dread Banner has (102-200)% increased Fortify duration

lines.flavourText:
The Trickster God turned the very Day and Night against each other.
What hope have you?

lines.name: Doryani's Prototype

explicitModifiers.text: Armour also applies to Lightning Damage taken from Hits
Lightning Resistance does not affect Lightning Damage taken
Nearby Enemies have Lightning Resistance equal to yours

lines.flavourText:
"This was the first step in some grand design, 
lost to the ages, now ours to decipher." 
- Dominus, High Templar

lines.name: Abhorrent Interrogation

explicitModifiers.text: (20-25)% chance to inflict Withered for 2 seconds on Hit

Enemies take 4% increased Elemental Damage from your Hits for
each Withered you have inflicted on them
Your Hits cannot Penetrate or ignore Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText:
"We have methods of interrogation the Inquisitors only dream of."
- Marcus, Brotherhood Liaison

lines.name: Doedre's Malevolence

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (48-56) to (73-84) Chaos Damage to Spells
Skills Supported by Unleash have (30-50)% increased Seal gain frequency

lines.flavourText:
It was Doedre who learned that pain is just
as much about fear as it is about injury.

lines.name: The Ivory Tower

explicitModifiers.text: +30 to maximum Energy Shield per 100 Reserved Life
Regenerate 2% of Energy Shield per second
Chaos Damage is taken from Mana before Life

lines.flavourText: The mind is a filter through which anarchy becomes order.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour
lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Cherrubim's Maleficence

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

lines.flavourText:
"The Consort of Chaos descended,
swiftly, brutally, artfully, she consumed the living,
leaving naught behind but a Rosemarie bloom,
to celebrate the massacre."
- Blass, explorer, hunter, adventurer

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour
lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: The Vertex

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems have 50% reduced Mana Cost
Enemies Cannot Leech Mana From you

lines.flavourText:
"A queen should be seen, admired, but never touched."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Lycosidae

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 250 to 300 Cold Damage to Counterattacks

lines.flavourText: A true predator does not chase; It waits.

lines.flavourText: The Azmeri must never touch the Tears of Maji, lest Viridi weep.

lines.name: Sunspite

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate (75.2-124.9) Life per second while Ignited

lines.flavourText:
Burning goddess, shine so bright.
Set the world 'fore you alight.

lines.name: The Beast Fur Shawl
lines.flavourText:
The quickest way to understand
your own strengths and weaknesses
is to walk in the skin of another.

lines.name: Goldwyrm
lines.flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

The First of the Sky teaches us that unity and selflessness,
not division and greed, is what will carry us upwards.

The rest will come naturally.

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems

lines.flavourText: When blood is paid, the weak think twice.

The night of a thousand ribbons

lines.flavourText:
Greatest is the Brine King's domain,

not through force, but patience.

An angry god is one thing, 
but you should really fear a god

"When you have nothing to hide,

lines.flavourText:
Curse their vile Council,
They cast me aside as if I am some bastard child.
If they only knew the power I possess.

They are for the weak and frightened.
Instead, light the path to greatness,
So that I may begin my bright pursuit.

Zealots in mortis enslaved

lines.flavourText:

Only faith can be your walls

Twice as strong and twice as thick

Brittle.

Come, let me show you.

He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.

I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

As she was sentenced to death, Doedre was silent.
As she was tied to the stake, Doedre was silent.
As the flames licked away her life, Doedre was silent.
But Wraeclast had not heard the last of her.

lines.name: Briskwrap

of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen

lines.name: Devoto's Devotion

Swift as thought are the actions of Man 
when borne on wings of divine providence.

Carry your blade into their hearts.

lines.name: Hrimsorrow

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-7) to (13-15) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
50% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects 10 Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
Of ancient giants, none remain,
Their only trace is timeless pain.

lines.name: Hyrri's Bite

implicitModifiers.text: +(3-4) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Cold Damage to Attacks
+(2-3) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks

lines.flavourText:
A Karui woman's place was not the 
battlefield, but the hearth.
Hyrri changed all of that.

lines.name: Incandescent Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (0.8-1)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

lines.name: Kaom's Roots

explicitModifiers.text: Action Speed cannot be modified to below base value

lines.flavourText: Don't flinch. It's a waste of good hitting time.

lines.name: Kitava's Thirst

explicitModifiers.text:
50% chance to Trigger Socketed Spells when
you Spend at least 100 Mana to Use a Skill

lines.flavourText:
Tukohama, Tawhoa and Kitava went to the lake to fish.
Tawhoa weaved a net to catch the fish,
Tukohama built a fire to cook the fish,
and Kitava swallowed the entire lake, fish and all, with a single gulp.

lines.name: Lightning Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (20-30) Lightning Damage to Attacks
30% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
"There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

lines.name: Malachai's Loop

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit
(12-16)% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Shocks you when you reach Maximum Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
Thaumaturgy has no limit.
It is our fragile reality that imposes boundaries.

lines.name: Malachai's Simula
lines.flavourText:
It was a sliver of Malachai's soul
that animated the first Eternal Guardian.

lines.name: Maloney's Nightfall

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-10) to (14-16) Physical Damage to Bow Attacks
25% chance to create a Smoke Cloud when Hit
(40-60)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Fear not the dark, the song of night,
Hear not the arch, the falling cry.
My giving sun, fight no more,
Rest alone, my grand nightfall.

lines.name: Meginord's Vise

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 2% of Life per second with at least 400 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Ride with pride,
strike with vengeance,
live with honour.

lines.name: Mindspiral

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (5-10)% of Maximum Mana as Extra Maximum Energy Shield
Enemies Cannot Leech Mana From you
(5-10)% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

lines.flavourText: Where top is bottom and weak is strong.

lines.name: Mutewind Pennant

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Onslaught for 4 seconds when you Warcry

lines.flavourText: Embrace the snow or be buried.

lines.name: Mutewind Whispersteps

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (25-30) to (40-50) Cold Damage to Spells
(50-70)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

lines.flavourText:
Corruption sweeps across this land,
but our bloodline is clear.
It is our duty to keep it so.

lines.name: Queen of the Forest

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per 600 Evasion Rating, up to 75%
-(50-40) Physical Damage taken from Hits by Animals

lines.flavourText:
Shedding away her regal past, 
she forged a new destiny. 
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man, 
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature. 
Seizing her one true wish, 
she found peace at last.

lines.name: Rat's Nest
lines.flavourText:
A lad with no fear of the pest 
Let rats fill his helmet in jest 
When they picked his skull clean
Where his head should have been
Was naught but a vermin-filled nest!

lines.name: Rearguard

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 6 to 12 Physical Damage to Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"It's a rare man that has eyes in the back of his head."
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

lines.name: Redblade Tramplers

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (2-5) to (7-10) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Our home was swallowed beneath 
the great mountain for our complacency. 
Now we must prove our value to the Molten One 
by sating his hunger for life.

lines.name: Repentance
lines.flavourText:
"I ask not for understanding,
only for forgiveness
for what I am about to do.
There will be blood on these shackles yet."
- Anonymous carving, Axiom Prison.

lines.name: Rime Gaze

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Concentrated Effect
+(16-22)% to Cold Damage over Time Multiplier

lines.flavourText: The malice in her gaze froze blood and shattered bone.

lines.name: Rise of the Phoenix

explicitModifiers.text: +25% to Fire Resistance while on Low Life
10% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
Cannot be Ignited while on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
My bearer shall be guarded by flame,
for I am the phoenix, forever radiant in glory.

lines.name: Sadima's Touch

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

lines.name: Saemus' Gift
lines.flavourText:
Beaten in contest, he would try once more
Guided by magic, Magjar took aim at a dove
Saemus' gift would influence the score
Guided by darkness, Magjar spilled the blood of his love

lines.name: Saffell's Frame
lines.flavourText: A swift mind solves problems before they occur.

lines.name: Shaper's Touch

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
Nothing.

lines.name: Skullhead

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have +10% Chance to Block Attack Damage
Minions Regenerate 2% of Life per second

lines.flavourText:
All that was left of the Iron King was his bleached skull.
Yet it was all the Iron King needed.

lines.name: Soul Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Spell Totem
+1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems
Inflicts a random Level 20 Curse on you when your Totems die

lines.flavourText:
The greatest mistakes cause suffering 
long after they have been made

lines.name: Starkonja's Head

explicitModifiers.text: 50% reduced Damage when on Low Life
150% increased Global Evasion Rating when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
There was no hero made out of Starkonja's death,
but merely a long sleep made eternal.

lines.name: Steppan Eard

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Movement Speed on Shocked Ground
Regenerate 2% of Life per second on Chilled Ground

lines.flavourText:
To fight an enemy on their lands is a tactical mistake. 
Make those lands your own, and the mistake becomes theirs.

lines.name: The Beast Fur Shawl
lines.flavourText:
The quickest way to understand
your own strengths and weaknesses
is to walk in the skin of another.

lines.name: The Blood Dance

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
4% reduced Attack and Cast Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate (0.8-1)% of Life per second per Frenzy Charge
(20-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
(20-30)% increased Damage per Frenzy Charge with Hits against Enemies on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
"Sharks thrash and swirl 
To the pounding drum of their frenzied hearts
As they dance in the waters red."
-Lavianga, Guardian of the Karui Way

lines.name: The Bringer of Rain

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Melee Physical Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Faster Attacks
Socketed Gems are supported by Level 18 Blind
Adds 20 to 30 Physical Damage to Attacks
20% chance to gain an Endurance Charge when you Block

lines.flavourText:
"What lies beneath your feet?!"
"Sacred ground, watered with tears of blood!"

lines.name: The Broken Crown

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 20 Cast on Death
20% increased Damage when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Every rule has an exception.

lines.name: The Gull

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 1 Create Lesser Shrine when you Kill an Enemy
75% increased Effect of Shrine Buffs on you
50% increased Duration of Shrine Effects on you

lines.flavourText:
"It is the Gull that delivers Man unto Ancestor.
The consumer of our flesh. The seeder of our
souls unto the earth. We give the Gull his life.
The Gull gives us our Way."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: The Peregrine

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
We wander to pass time.
We travel to fulfill.

lines.name: The Rat Cage

explicitModifiers.text: 10% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
The truth lies inside every man, if you dig around. 
Many a confession was found in the bowels of Axiom.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate (20-30) Life per second per Endurance Charge
100% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: Thunderfist

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Added Lightning Damage
Adds 1 to 100 Lightning Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The roar of the heavens
Strikes more than fear
Into the hearts of Man

lines.name: Titucius' Span

explicitModifiers.text: -(80-50) Physical Damage taken from Projectile Attacks
+25% Chance to Block Projectile Attack Damage

lines.flavourText:
A mighty bulwark, curved and strong
A dauntless wall, against the throng
All lance and arrow, knocked aside
For rout of foe, for turn of tide.

lines.name: Trolltimber Spire

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Area of Effect for Skills used by Totems
0.5% of Damage dealt by your Totems is Leeched to you as Life
You and your Totems Regenerate 0.5% of Life per second for each Summoned Totem

lines.flavourText:
The problem with working fresh trolltimber:
by the time you've carved out one end, 
the other has sprouted fresh roots!

lines.name: Vaal Caress

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Vaal Gems
You gain Onslaught for 5 seconds on using a Vaal Skill

lines.flavourText:
"The gems are strangely human at times.
They simply love to be held."
- Doryani, First Seer to the Queen

lines.name: Victario's Flight

explicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
10% increased Movement Speed for you and nearby Allies

lines.flavourText:
Alive but not unscathed, Victario fled
as slaughter blossomed at the gates.

lines.name: Viper's Scales

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Poison on Hit with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Swift and silent.
One strike, one corpse.

lines.name: Vis Mortis

explicitModifiers.text: Minions gain (15-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Reap what others have sown
Muster them from their graves
Parade them for your pleasure
Zealots in mortis enslaved

lines.name: Voidbringer

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Elemental Gems
(125-150)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
+(40-80) to Total Mana Cost of Skills

lines.flavourText: Absolute corruption empowers absolutely.

lines.name: Wanderlust
lines.flavourText: All the world is my home.

lines.name: Wyrmsign

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Concentrated Effect
4% reduced Mana Cost per Endurance Charge
Gain Rampage while at Maximum Endurance Charges
Lose all Endurance Charges when Rampage ends

lines.flavourText:
Those who witness the shimmering scales of the wyrm
know only fear for the rest of their lives.
Fortunately, the rest of their lives
can be measured in seconds.

lines.name: Voll's Vision

explicitModifiers.text: (8-12)% increased Maximum Life if no Equipped Items are Corrupted
Regenerate 100 Life per second if no Equipped Items are Corrupted

lines.flavourText: Righteous men seek virtue like tame pups seek praise.

lines.name: Ahn's Heritage

explicitModifiers.text: -10% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage
+2% to all maximum Resistances while you have no Endurance Charges
You have Onslaught while at maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
"It's not Karui, Azmeri or even Vaal in origin,
but one thing is certain. It is very, very old."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 46

lines.name: The Embalmer

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Vile Toxins

lines.flavourText:
"Decomposition takes hold too quickly!
No, if we are to keep the specimen in perfect shape,
we must begin the process before expiry."

lines.name: Tinkerskin

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for throwing Traps
15% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
30% chance to gain Phasing for 4 seconds when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
Recover 100 Life when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
Recover 50 Energy Shield when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Thin is the line between mechanical genius and magic.

lines.name: Dendrobate

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Lesser Poison
(75-100)% increased Damage with Poison if you have at least 300 Dexterity
(15-25)% increased Poison Duration if you have at least 150 Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
Ask any tracker and they'll tell you:
the most dangerous animals
are the ones who don't bother to hide.

lines.name: The Coming Calamity

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Herald Gems
35% chance to avoid being Stunned for each Herald Buff affecting you
Mana Reservation of Herald Skills is always 45%

lines.flavourText:
Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark.
Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm.
Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight.
By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

lines.name: Allelopathy
lines.flavourText:
"Nothing is more natural than competition.
One feasts, another starves.
One blossoms, another withers.
And one cannot catch the golden sunlight
without casting a bitter shadow."
- Cadiro Perandus

lines.name: Malachai's Mark

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Malachai's Endurance, Frenzy and Power for 6 seconds each, in sequence

lines.flavourText: What man does not wish for immortality?

lines.name: Wraithlord

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
Minions Regenerate 1% of Life per second

lines.flavourText:
Countless men proclaimed themselves the masters of death,
and each one succumbed to it.

lines.name: Kalisa's Grace

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Faster Casting
Gain +2% to Critical Strike Chance for 2 seconds after Spending a total of 800 Mana

lines.flavourText:
"You shall hang, in blissful agony, on my every note."
- Kalisa, Prima Donna of Sarn

lines.name: Bloodbond

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have (6-10)% chance to Dodge Attack Hits

lines.flavourText: What mother wouldn't give her life for that of her children?

lines.name: Iron Heart

explicitModifiers.text:
Strength's Damage Bonus instead grants 3% increased Melee
Physical Damage per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"The Council have a great many secrets.
Some are better kept that way, Cospri."
- Mauritius, the Iron Heart

lines.name: Blasphemer's Grasp

explicitModifiers.text: +6 to Maximum Life per Elder Item Equipped
+4% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Ailments per Elder Item Equipped
8% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments per Elder Item Equipped
Remove an Ailment when you use a Flask if all Equipped Items are Elder Items

lines.flavourText:
Reaching nature's limits, 
many sought power in the unnatural.

lines.name: Tombfist

explicitModifiers.text: With a Murderous Eye Jewel Socketed, Intimidate Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks
With a Searching Eye Jewel Socketed, Maim Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Ever watched a man crush another man's skull?
Hard to feel hope after that."

lines.name: Lightpoacher

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Spirit Burst when you Use a Skill while you have a Spirit Charge
+1 to Maximum Spirit Charges per Abyss Jewel affecting you
(15-20)% chance to gain a Spirit Charge on Kill
Recover (4-5)% of Life when you lose a Spirit Charge

lines.flavourText:
The eyes of the living hold a glimmer of hope.
Don't waste it.

lines.name: Bubonic Trail

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Death Walk when Equipped
10% increased Damage for each type of Abyss Jewel affecting you

lines.flavourText: Even the dead serve the Lightless.

lines.name: Mark of the Red Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Summoned Raging Spirits deal (130-150)% increased Damage
75% reduced Maximum number of Summoned Raging Spirits
Summoned Raging Spirits' Hits always Ignite

Summoned Raging Spirits' Melee Strikes deal Fire-only Splash
Damage to Surrounding Targets

lines.flavourText:
Gleeful are the few
who bask in the blood of the many.

lines.name: Gorgon's Gaze

explicitModifiers.text: 5% additional Physical Damage Reduction while moving
5% reduced Elemental Damage taken while stationary

lines.flavourText:
Men always fell for her honeyed eyes,
and broke when they hit the ground.

lines.name: Chains of Command

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Animate Guardian's Weapon when Animated Guardian Kills an Enemy
10% chance to Trigger Level 18 Animate Guardian's Weapon when Animated Weapon Kills an Enemy
Animated Guardian deals 5% increased Damage per Animated Weapon
Animated Minions' Melee Attacks deal Splash Damage to surrounding targets
Animated Minions' Melee Attacks deal 50% less Damage to surrounding targets

lines.flavourText:
A general may carry his men to greatness, 
or be dragged beneath the mire by their burden.

lines.name: Zeel's Amplifier

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Area of Effect per Enemy killed recently, up to 50%
You have Zealot's Oath if you haven't been hit recently

lines.flavourText:
"Great minds wish to reveal all the secrets of time and space.
But it does not matter. Creation, the act of Matter Metamorphosis, 
is the only secret worth discovering." 
- Zeel, Vaal Tinkerer

lines.name: Demon Stitcher

explicitModifiers.text: Sacrifice 5% of Life to gain that much Energy Shield when you Cast a Spell

lines.flavourText:
Xibaqua's treachery was met with divine fury.
One by one, the gods reclaimed their flesh,
until all that remained was a droplet of pure light:
The first Vaal.

lines.name: Worldcarver

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Arcane Wake after Spending a total of 200 Mana
6% increased Attack Damage for each Map Item Modifier affecting the Area
3% increased Attack Speed for each Map Item Modifier affecting the Area

lines.flavourText: Is it better to find new lands - or to create them?

lines.name: Thundersight

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Elemental Damage per Sextant affecting the area

lines.flavourText: See creation as it is, energetic and storming.

lines.name: Galesight

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Elemental Damage per Sextant affecting the area

lines.flavourText: See creation as it will be, frozen and silent.

lines.name: Flamesight

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Elemental Damage per Sextant affecting the area

lines.flavourText: See creation as it was, aflame and frantic.

lines.name: Triad Grip

explicitModifiers.text: Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Fire Damage per Red Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Cold Damage per Green Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Lightning Damage per Blue Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Chaos Damage per White Socket
Minions have (5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite

lines.flavourText: The secret of the elements lies within a square triangle.

lines.name: The Ivory Tower

explicitModifiers.text: +30 to maximum Energy Shield per 100 Reserved Life
Regenerate 2% of Energy Shield per second
Chaos Damage is taken from Mana before Life

lines.flavourText: The mind is a filter through which anarchy becomes order.

lines.name: Painseeker

explicitModifiers.text: Critical Strikes do not inherently apply non-Damaging Ailments
Inflict non-Damaging Ailments as though dealing (100-200)% more Damage

lines.flavourText: Lay bare paths to pain you never knew you had.

lines.name: Eye of Malice

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to inflict Cold Exposure on Hit
25% chance to inflict Fire Exposure on Hit
Nearby Enemies have 50% increased Fire and Cold Resistances

lines.flavourText:
Through vision coloured by burning rage and icy hate
peers a visitor from a realm of ill intent...

lines.name: Scorpion's Call

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 6 to 12 Physical Damage to Bow Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: (150.1-200) Life Regenerated per Second while in Blood Stance
(40-60)% increased Projectile Damage while in Blood Stance
+(700-1000) to Evasion Rating while in Sand Stance
(20-30)% increased Area of Effect while in Sand Stance
(25-30)% increased Attack Speed if youve changed Stance Recently
(25-30)% increased Attack Speed if you've changed Stance Recently

lines.flavourText: Claws open, brace for a bite. Stinger raised, dodge or die.

lines.name: Great Old One's Tentacles

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-12) to (15-20) Physical Damage to Attacks
(10-20)% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
50% chance for Impales on Enemies you Kill to Reflect Damage to surrounding Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Under its influence, shards of metal take on a life of their own, wriggling into flesh,
burrowing into organs, and exploding outwards in search of other victims.

lines.name: Emperor's Vigilance

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot Block while you have no Energy Shield

Damage from Blocked Hits cannot bypass Energy Shield
Damage from Unblocked hits always bypasses Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: Chitus' success stemmed from his cunning, taking calculated risks so that greater dangers could be averted.

lines.name: Fleshcrafter

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text:
Minions Convert 2% of their Maximum Life to Maximum Energy
Shield per 1% Chaos Resistance they have
Chaos Damage does not bypass Minions' Energy Shield
Minions have (50-100)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
While Minions have Energy Shield, their Hits Ignore Monster Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText: Imbue the body with stolen spirit, hold the leash tight.

lines.name: Chernobog's Pillar

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (30-35) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
25% chance to Curse non-Cursed Enemies with Enfeeble on Hit

lines.flavourText:
Fire dances with those who doubt
Licks the skin and flesh from the fearful
Where there is no fear
There is no flame

lines.name: Curtain Call

explicitModifiers.text: Skills which throw Mines throw up to 1 additional Mine if you have at least 800 Dexterity
Skills which throw Mines throw up to 1 additional Mine if you have at least 800 Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
Sing with me one last duet,
the curtain closes nigh.
Join me in a quiet song,
Before we all must die.

lines.name: Dialla's Malefaction

explicitModifiers.text: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +1 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +10% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 25% increased Experience

lines.flavourText:
He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

lines.name: Shackles of the Wretched

explicitModifiers.text: Curses in this item are reflected back to you
You cannot be Chilled for 3 seconds after being Chilled
You cannot be Frozen for 3 seconds after being Frozen
You cannot be Ignited for 3 seconds after being Ignited
You cannot be Shocked for 3 seconds after being Shocked
You grant (4-6) Frenzy Charges to allies on Death

lines.flavourText: Captivity breeds creativity.

lines.name: Hrimnor's Resolve

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently

lines.flavourText:
Hrimnor's presence was as cold as ice,
but his heart burned for vengeance.

lines.name: Ahn's Contempt

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (8-12)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage while at maximum Power Charges
You take 50% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes while you have no Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
"To touch it is to be overwhelmed with the need to carve your name into history.
A face no one remembers, yet once you have seen it, you will never forget."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 48

lines.name: The Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Added Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
My Soul is your Strength
My Price is your Blood

lines.name: Slitherpinch

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
A soft caress in dead of night,
that slips about the neck, so tight.

lines.name: Veruso's Battering Rams

explicitModifiers.text: 4% increased Melee Damage per Endurance Charge
You cannot be Shocked while at maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
With unending determination and resolve he destroyed first the gates, 
then the constructs guarding the tomb on the other side.

lines.name: Snakebite

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
6% increased Accuracy Rating per Frenzy Charge
10% reduced Frenzy Charge Duration per Frenzy Charge
Attacks have 60% chance to Poison while at maximum Frenzy Charges
+5% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Poison per Frenzy Charge

lines.flavourText:
"As the serpent shuns thought,
It shuns fear.
It strikes with the speed of wrath
And the skill of compulsion."
- Deshret, The Red Sekhema

lines.name: Torchoak Step

explicitModifiers.text: Totems Reflect 25% of their maximum Life as Fire Damage to nearby Enemies when Hit

lines.flavourText:
Centuries ago, there existed a unique grove imbued with ancestral fire.
As with all things, the Karui used its wood for war.

lines.name: Skirmish

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Attack Skills have +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems

lines.flavourText:
If two great leaders like Lioneye and Kaom
had been on the same side of the battle,
nothing would remain unconquered.

lines.name: Ondar's Clasp

explicitModifiers.text: 30% increased Attack Speed when on Full Life
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks
20% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
A single lightning strike fells a man.
A single knife stroke fells an empire.

lines.name: Asenath's Mark
lines.flavourText:
Asenath's mind was as quick and nimble
as the fingers that drew her bowstring.

lines.name: Infernal Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
15% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
25% increased Spell Damage taken when on Low Mana

lines.flavourText:
Despair hums, softly, deadly, in the bones of my enemies. 
Eyes will burn, and souls wither, as they bask in my radiance.

lines.name: Jaws of Agony

explicitModifiers.text: -(18-14) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
25% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Throw a Trap

lines.flavourText:
One wrong step triggers destruction. 
Agony slowly dominates the will to live.

lines.name: Zahndethus' Cassock

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% chance to create Consecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
When dead men rise and darkness falls
Only faith can be your walls
Walls of Light, not of brick
Twice as strong and twice as thick

lines.name: Maligaro's Lens

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby allies Recover 1% of your Maximum Life when you Die

lines.flavourText:
"Look around you. What do you see? 
Corruption, perversion, sin?
No. It is progress. 
You simply lack the means to see it." 
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Thousand Ribbons

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Elemental Proliferation
Adds 2 to 3 Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 2 to 3 Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 1 to 4 Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The night of a thousand ribbons
To remember the day of a thousand flames
When Sarn burned
And was born again

lines.name: Matua Tupuna

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
10% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills on your Minions
Spreads Tar when you take a Critical Strike
10% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText:
You carried me through life,
The least I can do is carry you through death.

lines.name: The Eternal Apple

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Warcry Skill when you lose Endurance Charges
You lose all Endurance Charges on reaching maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
The empire is both the tree and the fruit.
It provides safe harbour as ideas grow within,
and when the time is right, the apple is picked. 
The idea, and our ideals, take root.

lines.name: Dusktoe

explicitModifiers.text: +50% to Chaos Resistance during any Flask Effect
Adds (15-20) to (25-30) Chaos Damage to Spells and Attacks during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"A lick of shadow may ease 
the petty frictions of one's life."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Ezomyte Peak
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of servitude, a day
of glory, an eternity of death.

lines.name: Veil of the Night

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 1 to (180-220) Lightning Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText:
The seeds of greatness are planted in darkness,
Watered by suffering,
Tended by desperation,
And bloom steel flowers of victory.

lines.name: Giantsbane

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (3-6) to (10-12) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The monstrous men of yore used bows too,
theirs were just bigger.

lines.name: Surgebinders

explicitModifiers.text: (4-7)% increased Elemental Damage per Frenzy Charge
(4-7)% increased Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
(4-7)% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
10% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit

lines.flavourText:
Your lies are our strength.
Your threats are our laughter.
Your hate is our infinity
The fire rises!

lines.name: Thousand Teeth Temu

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Reflects 1 to 1000 Physical Damage to Attackers on Block
10% of Damage you Reflect to Enemies when Hit is gained as Life

lines.flavourText:
Crimson burn'd the star of sadness,
All was woe that seem'd but gladness.

lines.name: The Deep One's Hide

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 8 Physical Damage to Attacks
Adds 12 to 15 Cold Damage to Attacks
Curse Enemies with Level 5 Vulnerability on Block

lines.flavourText:
The thicker the shell,
the greater the beast that hunts it.

lines.name: Wheel of the Stormsail

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Duration of Curses on you
Curse Skills have 25% increased Skill Effect Duration

lines.flavourText: Doomed to plunder forever.

lines.name: Chalice of Horrors

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
10% Chance to Cause Monster to Flee on Block
Curse Skills have 100% increased Skill Effect Duration

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye. A curse for a curse.

lines.name: Kingsguard

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100 Life when you lose an Endurance Charge

lines.flavourText: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

lines.name: Three-step Assault

explicitModifiers.text: 10% chance to Dodge Spell Hits while Phasing

lines.flavourText:
Move in with haste.
Strike quick, strike hard.
Vanish like smoke in the wind.

lines.name: Craghead

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Bow Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 6 to 10 Physical Damage to Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText: Hit them hard. Hit them once.

lines.name: Daresso's Courage

explicitModifiers.text: +30% Chance to Block Spell Damage while on Low Life
+20% Chance to Block Attack Damage if you have Blocked Spell Damage Recently
+20% chance to Block Spell Damage if you have Blocked Attack Damage Recently

lines.flavourText:
By tourney's end, Daresso bled and shivered.
Yet even accursed treachery failed to steal the champion's victory.

lines.name: Foxshade

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 5 to 12 Physical Damage to Attacks
+500 to Evasion Rating while on Full Life

lines.flavourText: To catch an animal, think like an animal.

lines.name: Solaris Lorica

explicitModifiers.text: 25% reduced Chaos Damage taken over time
Chaos Damage does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Give me neither havens nor solace;
They are for the weak and frightened.
Instead, light the path to greatness,
So that I may begin my bright pursuit.

lines.name: Ashrend

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Fire Damage
(10-15)% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons
-(7-5) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

lines.name: Bramblejack

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 2 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
-2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
40% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker

lines.flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

lines.name: Cloak of Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 15 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
20% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

lines.name: Crown of Thorns

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 5 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
+5 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
Lift it lightly, don it slow.
The spikes point out and in, you know.

lines.name: Deerstalker

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 11 Trap
15% increased Movement Speed for 9 seconds on Throwing a Trap

lines.flavourText: Anticipation, preparation, exhilaration, celebration.

lines.name: Deidbell

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks
Cannot Leech when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: May you never hear it toll.

lines.name: Fairgraves' Tricorne

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 6 to 12 Cold Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Fairgraves' trusty tricorne accompanied him far across
the seas, deep under the ground, and even beyond death.

lines.name: Heatshiver

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Cold Damage if you have used a Fire Skill Recently
(20-30)% increased Fire Damage if you have used a Cold Skill Recently

lines.flavourText:
Give of your heated passions.
Give of your cold resolve.
You will be repaid.

lines.name: Icetomb
lines.flavourText:
When Solaris closes her burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

lines.name: Kaltenhalt

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Reflects (25-50) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: Cold, miserable and alone... but alive.

lines.name: Kongming's Stratagem

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Fog of War when your Trap is triggered
(30-50)% increased Fire Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies
30% reduced Spell Damage taken from Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered.
Those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid. 
Thus the wise win before they fight, 
while the ignorant fight to win.

lines.name: Lightbane Raiment

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Reflects 30 Chaos Damage to Melee Attackers
100% chance to create Desecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
. . . and the Light faded and hope waned
Zahndethus cast aside his faith
and embraced the darkness.

lines.name: Nomic's Storm

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Damage taken while on Full Energy Shield
20% increased Movement Speed while on Full Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: It takes a clear mind to outrun a storm.

lines.name: Shavronne's Pace

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne raced to Brutus' side,
her last hope against the Karui tide.

lines.name: Springleaf

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 3% of Life per second while on Low Life

lines.flavourText: From death springs life.

lines.name: The Three Dragons

explicitModifiers.text: Your Fire Damage can Shock but not Ignite
Your Cold Damage can Ignite but not Freeze or Chill
Your Lightning Damage can Freeze but not Shock

lines.flavourText:
"The ice seared his naked feet
As the lightning stilled his heart,
But it was the flames upon his lover's face
That roused him to vengeance."
- From 'The Three Dragons' by Victario of Sarn

lines.name: Wake of Destruction

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 120 Lightning Damage to Attacks
Drops Shocked Ground while moving, lasting 2 seconds

lines.flavourText:
Tempest's power given form,
Flee before the walking storm.

lines.name: Wondertrap

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Rarity of Items found when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Wonders abound at death's door.

lines.name: Speaker's Wreath

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Minion Attack Speed per 50 Dexterity
2% increased Minion Movement Speed per 50 Dexterity
Minions' Hits can only Kill Ignited Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A strong pair of legs may carry you far,
but a silver tongue and a few brutes
can take you to the edge of the world.

lines.name: Stormcharger

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText: Like lightning, the Ezomyte cavalry need never strike twice.

lines.name: Ralakesh's Impatience

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Frenzy, Endurance, or Power Charge once per second while you are Stationary
Lose all Frenzy, Endurance, and Power Charges when you Move

lines.flavourText:
For the immortal, what is the difference
between an age and an instant?
